sections.heading: Person, defined.Person means an individual, a trust or estate, a partnership, a limited liability company, a corporation, including associations, joint-stock companies, and insurance companies, a state, a political subdivision or instrumentality, including a municipal corporation, of a state, or any
sections.text: Person, defined.Person means an individual, a trust or estate, a partnership, a limited liability company, a corporation, including associations, joint-stock companies, and insurance companies, a state, a political subdivision or instrumentality, including a municipal corporation, of a state, or any legal entity recognized by the state.SourceLaws 1979, LB 172, § 22;Laws 1982, LB 378, § 13;Laws 1993, LB 121, § 445;R.S.1943, (1996), § 71-5822;Laws 1997, LB 798, § 16.
